DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Before the transport comes, do you want to go over any key points of your mission?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Caring Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Keep in mind everything you need is already given in secure paper files.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Tough Boss

choices.string: Everything’s crystal clear. I’m ready to go.
With all due respect, getting some codes, activating a virus and sending co-ordinates isn’t that hard.
I would like to review my contact’s information.
What are going to be my duties as detective?
How will I know that the decrypter is ready to use?

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Are you aware that this will be the last conversation we’ll have before you come back?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Tough Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Yes. I am ready to proceed.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: But you’re aware that this will be the last conversation we’ll have, right?
Noel Alt is an executive at White Shark. You’ll find his profile on your documents. He’s agreed to provide access to a secure terminal in exchange for rescue.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Caring Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Just remember that you need to get the codes first.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Tough Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: We don’t have information on that, as it’s a White Shark internal division. You’ll be briefed by the head of the department, Dr. Ross.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Tough Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Your intraepidermal implant …
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Caring Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: I believe this was covered by your training, right?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Tough Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: … Your intraepidermal implant will send neurosignals that will visually enhance the weak spots where you’ll be able to use it.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Caring Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Please try to remember that the device needs at least 3 minutes. It’s likely going to take you longer than that.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Tough Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Do NOT trust anyone there. Keep in mind the enemy is everywhere.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Tough Boss

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Welcome to your new room. Oh my! I cannot detect a bracelet on you. Please find one soon, I can’t really talk to you if you’re not wearing one!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Shammy

choices.string: Tell me more about White Shark.

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: I’m afraid I can’t answer that until you have your bracelet.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Shammy

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: I’m Shammy the Shark! I assist people in White Shark, especially those with bracelets.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Shammy

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Go get a bracelet! They’re loads of fun! If you’re the new tenant of this room, I can assume that your boss, Dr. Ross, has it. You can get to the office from the plaza, accessible from the elevator nearby.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Shammy

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: ...Really?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: (Well... that was annoying.)
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: May, send me the case files please.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: You always talk to me during cutscenes!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: May

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Don’t care. Do what you’re told.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: On it, Dr. Secretary.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: May

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: You’re the secretary.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: (sticks out tongue)
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: May

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Oh, hello Ms. Doe, welcome to White Shark, I’m looking forward to working with you. I hope you had a pleasant trip.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: (So THIS is Dr. Ross...)
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Indeed. I’m impressed with how well White Shark is organized. Your security is first-class. Speaking of which, my terminal mentioned you might have a bracelet for me.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Yes, usually you receive a bracelet upon entering White Shark. Since you are a special case, I have yours here.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: It stings the first time. However, the bracelet provides you with all the needed functions to operate within White Shark. It provides the wearer with proper identification and tools. You’ll notice a journal is now available, it has the details on your first case.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: It’s a simple robbery; I want to see how you do before I assign you anything serious.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: The suspects are a Nina Walker and Josh Susach. Both have used their right to remain silent, but we found character witnesses for each of them.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: We have the tool used for the robbery in the container nearby the witnesses. Your bracelet should let you open it.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: The witnesses, Noel Alt and Carlos Franco, are waiting to speak to you. We have not made the case public yet, so they’re only giving character testimony for the suspects. Head to the plaza, solve the case, and report to me.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Understood.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Good answer.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: You’re the new detective? God, it took you forever to get here.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Noel Alt

choices.string: Excuse me, are you Noel Alt?
I apologize for the wait, on whose behalf are you speaking?

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: What kind of question is that? If you want an autograph ask my secretary, but don't waste my time.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Noel Alt

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: I’m here for Nina Walker. She’s a student of mine, and a suspect. I am not sure exactly what she is being accused of, but she is too clumsy to have actually harmed anyone. Can we hurry this up? Nina has a programming lesson in about half an hour.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Noel Alt

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Ok, I’ll take that into consideration.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Amiga! It seems Fin people are getting hotter every day!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Carlos Franco

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: (You don’t have the right equipment, honey...)
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: I apologize for the wait, it is my first day here. On whose behalf are you speaking?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: It’s about my friend Josh Susach. He’s a rough bro, but still a good one. But honestly, I don't know why you're keeping me here, amiga. I mean… We all know some nerd broke into Triple X to get the latest watchamacallit of the Fin. Information flies, huh?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Carlos Franco

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: I know I'm Josh's friend, but for the love of all that's good amiga, have you seen him? He writes his "novels" on paper. PAPER. Who [REDACTED] uses PAPER?! I'm a pro hacker next to him.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Carlos Franco

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: I see.. Thank you for your input. (I think...)
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Anytime, guapa!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Carlos Franco

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Excellent deduction. Since Josh has no skill with electronics, it’s safe to assume Nina broke into Triple X. Since Noel is Nina’s supervisor, he can be responsible for her punishment.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: So is this settled then?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Jane Doe

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Yes. We work fast here at White Shark. Keep in mind, with your current bracelet you’re only granted access to public areas of the Fin, but should you prove to be reliable we’ll grant you a higher level of clearance. We will begin discussing your job in more detail tomorrow but you’re done for the day. You may head back to your room.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Alexia Ross
